meanings.sent1: She gartered her socks to keep them up.
meanings.sent2: He gartered the bouquet of flowers with a ribbon.
meanings.sent3: The chef gartered the herbs together for easy access.
meanings.sent4: The knight gartered his sword before heading into battle.
meanings.sent5: The tailor gartered the fabric tightly to create a neat hem.

meanings.sent1: The bride looked elegant in her gartered stockings.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's gartered leg peeked out from her costume.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured models in gartered outfits.
meanings.sent4: The historical reenactment required participants to be gartered.
meanings.sent5: The actor portrayed a character who was always gartered in the play.
